section.heading: Simplified acquisition threshold

subsection.heading: Simplified Acquisition Threshold.—
subsection.content: For purposes of acquisitions by agencies named in section 3063 of this title, the simplified acquisition threshold is as specified in section 134 of title 41.

subsection.heading: Inapplicable Laws.—
subsection.content: No law properly listed in the Federal Acquisition Regulation pursuant to section 1905 of title 41 shall apply to or with respect to a contract or subcontract that is not greater than the simplified acquisition threshold.

section.sourceCredit: (Added and amended Pub. L. 103–355, title IV, §§ 4002(a), 4102(a), Oct. 13, 1994, 108 Stat. 3338, 3340, § 2302a; Pub. section.heading: Implementation of simplified acquisition procedures

content.p: The simplified acquisition procedures contained in the Federal Acquisition Regulation pursuant to section 1901 of title 41 shall apply as provided in such section to the agencies named in section 3063 of this title.

section.sourceCredit: (Added Pub. L. 103–355, title IV, § 4203(a)(1), Oct. 13, 1994, 108 Stat. 3345, § 2302b; amended Pub. L. 111–350, § 5(b)(10), Jan. 4, 2011, 124 Stat. 3843; renumbered § 3572 and amended Pub. L. 116–283, div. A, title XVIII, § 1823(b), (c)(2), Jan. 1, 2021, 134 Stat. 4205.)

section.heading: Micro-purchase threshold

content.p: The micro-purchase threshold for the Department of Defense is $10,000.
